name: Pineapple Appetizer Meatballs
author: Lynn Lynn
summary: These pineapple meatballs are a great option that has tons of flavor. If you wish to serve as a main dish, you can use pasta, rice, or quinoa.
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) can pineapple chunks, drained with juice reserved
1 (6 ounce) can pineapple juice, or more as needed
directions: Mix grated ginger into ground beef and form into meatballs
Cook in a large skillet over medium-high heat until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes
Add pineapple chunks, onion, and bell pepper
Continue to cook until meatballs are no longer pink in the centers and vegetables are hot but not soft, 4 to 6 minutes more
Pour reserved pineapple juice into a large measuring cup
Add enough canned pineapple juice to measure 1 1/2 cups
Bring to a simmer in a small saucepan
Add cornstarch, 1 teaspoon at a time, to ensure it doesn't thicken too much
Pour pineapple sauce over the meatballs
